CustomField.formula: IF (OneCRM__Donor__r.RecordType.Name == 'Family', IF(OneCRM__Related_Contact__c != '' && OneCRM__Related_Contact__r.HasOptedOutOfEmail == false, OneCRM__Related_Contact__r.Email, IF(OneCRM__Donor__r.OneCRM__Primary_Contact__c != '' && OneCRM__Donor__r.OneCRM__Primary_Contact__r.Email!= '' && OneCRM__Donor__r.OneCRM__Primary_Contact__r.HasOptedOutOfEmail == false, OneCRM__Donor__r.OneCRM__Primary_Contact__r.Email, IF(OneCRM__Donor__r.OneCRM__Secondary_Contact__c != '' && OneCRM__Donor__r.OneCRM__Secondary_Contact__r.Email!= '', OneCRM__Donor__r.OneCRM__Secondary_Contact__r.Email,''))), OneCRM__Donor__r.OneCRM__Email__c)
CustomField.label: Donor Email
